price: Na akautoa mkono wake, na mara ukawa mweupe kwa watazamao.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
footnotes: Musa akautoa mkono wake kutoka mfukoni mwake. Hiyo ni Ishara ya pili. Nao ukawa mweupe, bila ya maradhi, hata wakashangaa watazamaji kwa kumetuka kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
